_header: Saint John the Gospeller us shows
Note: For the text in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4626.
_description: Gospel for First Sunday after Easter in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte Ione þe gospellere vs schawesIn oure gospell wiþ
                    semeli sawes…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…ffor when he thinkes on goddes thrawesþe fendes
                    fondinges fro vs drawes
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe gospeler vs schawesIn vr gospel wiþ semeli
                    sawes…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor whon we þenke on cristes sawesÞe fend his
                    fondyng from vs drawes
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Cum esset sero die illo & fores (f. 189rb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Þis say Seynt Ione þe euangelisteTelles vs howe þat
                    ihesu criste…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þis gostli schewyng makes þe fendeAnd his fondynges
                    fro vs wende
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title: Dominica in octava pasche secundum Iohannem (p. 184)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Iohn þe Gospellere vs schawisin oure Gospel semeli
                    sawishow ihesu crist ofter þat he ras…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…for whan we þinke on cristis sawisþe fendis fonding
                    fro vs he drawis
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima post Pascha Euangelium secundum Iohannem (f.
                    120v)

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Iohn þe gospellere vs schewesIn oure gospell wyth semely
                    sawes…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…for when we thynke on criste thrawesþe fende fayndyng
                    fra vs drawes

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe gospeller vs schawisIn oure gospell with swetely
                    sawis…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…ffor when we þynk on cristis thrawisþe fendys
                    temptynd [sic] fro vs hit drawis
